segments.text: I can't believe how much water is pouring out of the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is just standing there, drying dishes like nothing is happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the boy climbing on that wobbly stool, reaching for the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's going to fall and hurt himself if he's not careful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for cookies, not even noticing the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the woman should turn off the faucet and pay attention to the kids.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's frustrating to see such carelessness in the kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The floor is getting slippery with all that water, and no one seems to care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they realize how dangerous this situation is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to take control before something bad happens.
segments.speaker: PAR
